## R Markdown

This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see <http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com>.

#Install R and Python dependencies
```{r}
install.packages("reticulate")
library(reticulate)

py_install("pandas")
py_install("conda")
py_install("scipy")
py_install("poetry")
py_install("pint",pip=TRUE)
py_install("dataretrieval",pip=TRUE)
py_install("pip install git+https://github.com/USEPA/harmonize-wq.git", pip=TRUE)

conda_create("r-reticulate")

conda_install("r-reticulate", "geopandas")

use_condaenv("r-reticulate")

```
